title: Attacker Spawn Turret For Under B Tube / B Flank / A Flank
description: This is a great all around Turret that watches under B Tube, the B Flank, and the A Flank.

title: Early Round Mid Blue To Mid Boiler Nanoswarm
description: This lineup is useful at the very beginning of the round to help your teammates take some space in Mid. However, enemy players could get very aggressive or look for information that can help them stop you from taking that space in mid, if you are not careful / do not work well with your teammates to set this up.

title: Mid Boiler Turret Setup
description: Here's a variation of a standard Killjoy setup at mid. This setup allows your mid player to rotate more freely, as the Alarmbot and Turret cover any Attacker lurks effectively.

title: Retake B Mid Setup
description: Here's a simple, yet effective Killjoy setup that counters mid lurks. This setup allows you to stall the bomb plant for B Site and lets you and your team rotate fast.

title: Full Utility B Site Setup for Defender
description: Use this strong Killjoy setup to harass Attackers with all of your utility. Your turret allows you to focus on B Long with a teammate, as it watches your mid lurk.

title: Full Utility A Site Setup for Defender
description: Use this strong Killjoy setup to lock the A Site down with all of your utility. Adjust your turret according to the enemy team Viper, as it should still poke through her wall, allowing you to play a strong crossfire with you and your utility.

title: A Site Default Setup
description: A good setup for A Site with 3 Turret variations.

title: B Site Aggressive Turret + B Orange Turret
description: A good Turret to place aggressively and a good Turret to place to watch under Tube. Additionally, we have 3 potential Nanoswarm grenades and a good spot to place your Alarmbot.

title: B Site + B Kitchen Default Setup
description: A good setup that allows you to watch B Kitchen while also having utility on B Site for when enemies push toward planting.

title: Aggressive Two Person Setup For A Site
description: This is a great two person setup for A Site to do when you want to try to get picks on enemy players pushing into A Site. Eco rounds, or rounds where a duelist on your team wants to get Aggressive on A Site are common examples of situations you might use this setup.

title: Right A Site To A Nest Nanoswarm
description: This lineup is useful both for stopping the Attackers from taking control of A Site, and for stopping the Attackers from peeking from A Tower post-plant.

title: Right A Pyramid Post Plant Nanoswarm
description: This is a useful post plant Nanoswarm for the corner on the far right side of the A Pyramids on the side of A Cave.

title: B Site Default Post Plant Nanoswarm
description: This is a simple, but useful post plant Nanoswarm lineup from just outside of Mid Cannon near the B Window Stairs.

title: B Site Turret For B Tunnel / B Main
description: This is a simple, but effective Turret that watches both B Tunnel and B Main.

title: Full Utility Setup For B Main Choke Point
description: This is a great full utility setup to keep a tight hold on the B Main Chokepoint. This setup can be played from B Tunnel or B Back.

title: Rafters Nanoswarm For Sands Push
description: Use this lineup to isolate the Defenders when taking Sands, as they cannot come out of the smoke unpunished to help their teammates.

title: Safe Spawn Turret
description: Here's a strong Turret to use to spot for any Defender aggression coming from both mains. Place it during the planning phase.

title: A Site Post Plant Lineup
description: Position your crosshair at the top of the building shown in this video, and jump throw for a successful post plant molly.

title: Arcade Turret For Information
description: Place this Turret during planning phase to gain information of any aggressive pushes from Arcade or Dish. Positioning close to the zip allows for an easy escape, while simultaneously obtaining information of a potential crunch.

title: B Site Post Plant Nanoswarms For Front / Back B Site Boxes
description: Here are two great post plant lineups for the front and back side of the boxes in the spike plant area of B Site.

title: Retake Lockdown / Nanoswarm Combo For B Site
description: This is a great Lockdown / Nanoswarm Combo for B Site. This Lockdown used alongside a Nanoswarm for the corner in A Tower that is not effected by the Lockdown can potentially force players to have decide between being picked off by a Nanoswarm, and being detained by the Lockdown to escape the Nanoswarm.

title: A Main Lockdown Placement For A Site / A Drop
description: This is a great Lockdown for A Site / A Drop. This Lockdown used alongside default Smokes can create a strong opportunity for you and your teammates to push into A Site. If you and your team coordinate the timing of using this Lockdown - you could potentially pinch players who have to rotate out of inner A drop into A Dish.

title: A Drop Lockdown Placement For All Of A Site
description: This is a great Lockdown for all of A Site. This Lockdown used alongside default Smokes can create a strong opportunity for you and your teammates to push into A Site. If you and your team coordinate the timing of using this Lockdown - you could potentially pinch players who have to rotate out of inner A Site into A Main.

title: Aggressive Turret For Dish Control
description: Use this setup to contest for Dish/Drop, while stalling A Main. If uncontested and you have ult, you could retake the A Site from Drop.

title: Off Site Sands Turret
description: Use this setup to isolate Attackers when executing the A Site. This Turret allows you to fight Sands with an extra crossfire, the Mollies stall for your team's rotations, and the Alarmbot gains information of a potential lurker.

title: Start Round Alarmbot For Arcade
description: Isolate Attacker's executes by using this setup. Use your Mollies to stall B Main Attackers and focus your resources towards Arcade. Since your Alarmbot and Turret prevents any lurks from occurring on the B Site, this allows for your teammate to have more freedom to rotate and have an easier time contesting Arcade with you.

title: Standard Turret Setup To Spot Arcade
description: Here's a good, standard setup to use to cover both lanes that approach the B Site.

title: Full Utility Setup For A Main / A Drop
description: This is a great Full Utility Setup to do damage to players pushing through A Main into A Site, that delays players from approaching the A Main / A Site chokepoint - while also keeping somewhat of a hold on A Drop / A Dish.

title: Retake Lockdown / Nanoswarm Combo For B Site
description: This is a great Lockdown / Nanoswarm Combo for B Site. This Lockdown used alongside a Nanoswarm for the corner in A Tower that is not effected by the Lockdown can potentially force players to have decide between being picked off by a Nanoswarm, and being detained by the Lockdown to escape the Nanoswarm.

title: B Generator Turret For B Main / B Arcade
description: This B Generator Turret will react to players pushing up B Main, as well as players pushing through B Arcade.

title: Full Utility Setup For A Main / A Site Choke Point
description: This is a great Full Utility Setup for the A Main / A Site Chokepoint that makes it very difficult for players to push into A Site from A Main, doing a lot of damage to players attempting to push into A Site in the process - or at least buying some time for your team to rotate to A to help defend A. One added benefit of this setup is that the Turret will react to players pushing out of A Main, players jumping down from A Drop, and players who have pushed far enough through A Ropes.

title: Simple A Site Stairs Turret For A Main / A Drop / A Ropes
description: This Turret will react to players pushing out of A Main onto A Site, players jumping down from A Drop, and players who have pushed far enough through A Ropes into A Site.

title: Early Round Shop Turret For Mid
description: Here's a strong combination of utility that spots your B flank and any aggressive pushes from Mid.

title: Early Round Turret For Mid
description: Place this Turret at the start of the round to punish Defenders from aggressively peeking Mid.

title: Nanoswarm Back A Site Lineup
description: Throw this molly to allow for an easier execute on the A Site, it flushes any Defender playing that back site position out.

title: Turret + Swarm Grenade B Site Execute and Post Plant
description: This Execute and Post Plant setup allows you to help your team to get out onto B Site, while playing close enough to your Turret to allow it to watch the flank.

title: B Site Lockdown Execute + Molly Setup
description: Here's a simple, but effective way to Execute onto B Site using a Lockdown, that also creates the opportunity for you to pick off enemies who try to avoid the Lockdown in back B Site.

title: A Site Full Utility Lockdown Execute
description: Here's an aggressive full utility Lockdown Execute for A Site.

title: Standard B Site / Link Setup
description: Here's a strong setup to play off of the B Site, only using your Turret to confirm information. You are able to listen to footsteps and utility from the bottom of Link, so it'll be easy to prepare yourself for their B Site execute. It is recommended to fight for Link control with a teammate.

title: Retake Lockdown For B Site + B Long
description: Use this setup to contest Link control with a teammate to ensure your Lockdown. There are no gaps to it, so be wary of Attackers seeking to destroy your ult.

title: Retake Lockdown For A Main
description: Use this setup to contest for Art/Mid to set up your Lockdown to retake the A Site. This ultimate will push Attackers to either take Art or Spawn, or flush them all the way out back towards their own Spawn.

title: Standard Turret Setup For Art
description: Here's a simple, yet effective setup that allows you to play between the A Site and Art.
